name: The Future is Down - Frame by Frame Snake
name_original: The Future is Down - Frame by Frame Snake
description:
The Future is Down - Frame by Frame Snake

The future is down is a prototype for a frame based snake game in which you play with a little robot that can build pointers to direct the snake in the direction of the batteries that it craves.

The thing is.... the snake only advances when you move down. You can use the green frame-highway to move ahead multiple frames more easily

Controls

DescriptionKeyJumpSpace
Left ArrowMove LeftRight ArrowMove Right1, 2, 3Set Target (yellow square) to Left, Top or Right positionW,A,S,DPlace a direction pointer for the snake (Up, Left, Down, Right)EPlace a block (Can be used to stand on to get to higher locations)
